description.paragraph1: “Borbor Aqua” natural spring water is bottled from the Borbor source located in Zoragyugh village (Martuni region) of Gegharkunik Province by “New Aqua” LLC. The water is non-carbonated and rich in natural minerals and elements that play an essential role in human health and life.
description.paragraph2: It originates from deep mountain layers, which allows for natural filtration through soil and rock layers. The water undergoes multi-stage purification while preserving its natural minerals, naturally obtained from the mountain spring. Our product contains no additives. It passes strict quality control in certified laboratories of the Republic of Armenia and has been granted the status of a “pure source.”
description.paragraph3: Available sizes: 0.25 L, 0.33 L, 0.5 L, 0.75 L, 1 L, 5 L, 19 L.
